{{Infobox settlement |name = {{raise|0.2em|Gaizhou}} |official_name = |native_name = {{lower|0.1em|{{nobold|{{lang|zh-hans|盖州市}}}}}} |postal_code_type = [[Postal code of China|Postal code]] |settlement_type = [[County-level city]] |image_skyline = |image_map = ChinaYingkouGaizhou.png |map_caption = Location in Yingkou |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = [[People's Republic of China]] |subdivision_type1 = [[Province (China)|Province]] |subdivision_name1 = [[Liaoning]] |subdivision_type2 = [[Prefecture-level city]] |subdivision_name2 = [[Yingkou]] | area_total_km2 = 2930.0 | area_urban_km2 = 150.00 | area_footnotes = {{cite book |editor1=[[Ministry of Housing and Urban-Rural Development]] |title=China Urban Construction Statistical Yearbook 2017 |date=2019 |publisher=China Statistics Press |location=Beijing |page=50 |url=http://www.mohurd.gov.cn/xytj/tjzljsxytjgb/jstjnj/w02019012421874448287322500.xls |accessdate=11 January 2020}} | population_total = 704000 | population_as_of = 2017 | population_urban = 231100 | population_footnotes = |population_density_km2 = auto |pushpin_map = China Liaoning |pushpin_label_position = left |pushpin_map_caption = Location in Liaoning |coordinates = {{coord|40|24|N|122|21|E|type:adm3rd_region:CN-21|display=inline}} |elevation_ft = 30 |elevation_m = 9.1 |timezone = [[China Standard Time|China Standard]] |utc_offset = +8 |website = }} {{Infobox Chinese|psp=Kaichow
Kaihsien (1965–1992)
Kaiping (until 1965)|s=盖州|t=蓋州|w=Kai4-chou1|p=Gàizhōu}} {{Infobox Chinese|title=Gaixian|psp=Kaihsien|s=盖县|t=蓋縣|w=Kai4-hsien4|p=Gàixiàn}} {{Infobox Chinese|title=Gaiping|psp=Kaiping|s=盖平|t=蓋平|w=Kai4-ping2|p=Gàipíng}} '''Gaizhou''' ({{zh|s=盖州 |t=蓋州 |p=Gàizhōu}}), formerly '''Gaixian''', ''Gaiping'', and '''Kaiping''', is a [[county-level city]] in [[Liaoning]] province, China. It is under the administration of [[Yingkou]] City, which lies {{convert|31|km|abbr=on}} to the north-northwest, and is located at the northwest end of the [[Liaodong Peninsula]] near the northeast coast of the [[Bohai Sea]]. ==Administrative divisions== There are 6 [[Subdistrict (China)|subdistricts]], 18 [[Town (China)|towns]], and 3 [[Township (People's Republic of China)|townships]] under the city's administration.[http://www.xzqh.org/html/list/78.html 营口市-行政区划网] Subdistricts: *[[Gulou Subdistrict, Gaizhou|Gulou Subdistrict]] (鼓楼街道), [[Xicheng Subdistrict, Gaizhou|Xicheng Subdistrict]] (西城街道), [[Dongcheng Subdistrict, Gaizhou|Dongcheng Subdistrict]] (东城街道), [[Taiyangsheng Subdistrict]] (太阳升街道), [[Tuanshan Subdistrict, Gaizhou|Tuanshan Subdistrict]] (团山街道), [[Xihai Subdistrict]] (西海街道) Towns: *[[Gaotun]] (高屯镇), [[Shagang, Gaizhou|Shagang]] (沙岗镇), [[Jiulongdi]] (九垄地镇), [[Jiuzhai]] (九寨镇), [[Wanfu, Gaizhou|Wanfu]] (万福镇), [[Wolongquan]] (卧龙泉镇), [[Qingshiling]] (青石岭镇), [[Nuanquan]] (暖泉镇), [[Guizhou, Gaizhou|Guizhou]] (归州镇), [[Bangshibu]] (榜式堡镇), [[Tuandian]] (团甸镇), [[Shuangtai]] (双台镇), [[Yangyun]] (杨运镇), [[Xutun]] (徐屯镇), [[Shizijie]] (什字街镇), [[Kuangdonggou]] (矿洞沟镇), [[Chentun]] (陈屯镇), [[Liangtun]] (梁屯镇), Townships: *[[Xiaoshipeng Township]] (小石棚乡), [[Guoyuan Township]] (果园乡), [[Ertai Township]] (二台乡) ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== {{County-level divisions of Liaoning}} {{coord|40|24|N|122|21|E|source:kolossus-dewiki|display=title}} [[Category:County-level divisions of Liaoning]] [[Category:Yingkou]] {{Liaoning-geo-stub}}
